name: The Devils Treasure
description:
Welcome to The Devils Treasure... 

Your goal is to navigate through each of the treasure rooms collecting all treasures before reaching the end. When first entering a level you will see that all booby traps are either possessed by a hell spirit or a heaven spirit. The hell spirits are good and will help you however the heaven spirits are bad and wont. You must memorize the correct path to take by navigating around the heaven spirits in order to collect all treasures as they will try their best to not allow you to proceed.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Movement

Click on pack to open, and you must select two cards before proceeding into the level.

Programming, Design, Audio and Art by: https://d4ngus1.itch.io/

Art by: https://krizzy-arts.itch.io/

Thanks :)
